notes.text: An automated reminder added to a Google Calendar, titled "Client Meetings"

Once a contact has been created, a confirmation e-mail is sent to the registering party, welcoming them to the company and notifying them of a follow-up meeting that has been set for a week ahead of registration date.
Upon completion and submission of the Google Form, A contact will be created and added to the company contacts.
A Google Form to gather the relevant information for a client signing up for our services.
